EN: Geralt talked to a Redanian officer and accepted a quest to search for some lost soldiers.
Go to the woods where the soldiers went lost.
In search of a job, Geralt decided to check the noticeboard in Novigrad.
Geralt found contract about disappeared squad of Redanians. The paper said that Redanian officer, who can provide more details, can be found on the bridge on Temple Isle.
After receiving all the required information, Geralt went to investigate the area where redanian soldiers have probably vanished.
Go to the woods where redanians got lost.
Use your Witcher Senses to find the lost soldiers.
You witchers, we can't count on you.
I need a help! Get over here.
Wait until the officer woke up.

Geralt has found soldiers, their corpses were lying in the ravine near other bodies. Geralt has noticed that all of them were cyanotic, had weirdly bent poses, and probably have died because of breathing failure. But what have caused this?
Check out the body of the white-haired witcher.
I sent my soldiers to patrol area near Ursten.
Geralt went into elven ambush, intoxicated with an unknown poison, he have lost any control over his body. The help came in an unexpected way - another witcher in heavy armor hurried to help Geralt.
I haven't had any news for several days.
Filling out contracts, that's what you witchers do for a living.
Skin's unnaturally pale. No injuries. Hm...
Redanian soldier. Looks like he suffocated. Horrible way to die.
Hum... I will have a look.
The Redanian army is asking you.
You'll be well paid if you unravel this mystery.
I can't imagine asking my superior for help because I've lost my troops.
You have a reputation for not being very talkative, so…
You find my boys, I pay you, and everyone's happy!
That's all you witchers ever talk about.
Perfect! Come and find me when you've cleared up this mess.
I need a help! Get over here.
